1123120.name: Arizona Derby Official Soundtrack
1123120.description:
Immerse at official rap "Arizona Derby" Soundtrack featuring numerous hip-hop styled beats and remix, produced by Texas rap artist TxMic especially hyped for the "Arizona Derby" game and its content over course of the 4 years of development.




This DLC is only for rap soundtrack of the game, while other soundtracks aren't included.

Thank you TxMic, for great music production which added a very special note to the game, I was listening while developing and extending content, one day we will have e-sport competitions, while you burning Arena with your great freestyle!


Houston gave many big names in the world of hip-hop, among Scarface, Spice 1, Geto Boys, etc..
TxMic for sure, standing shoulder to shoulder with A-class world artists nowdays, like 50 Cent, Jay-Z, Drake, Kendry Lamar, Snoop, Dr. Dre.. His unique expressions, wild and in same time cool style, ease of dropping ultimate lyrics, making him one of the most talented rappers nowadays. Smooth hip-hop beats leading atmosphere of the racing to the boiling, cooling it down and then hardly bringing to the tops. Congrats for this production, it's 100% fits the game and this soundtrack is one of the most connected soundtracks with any game ever, literally, since soundtrack impacts on game development over course of 4 years and vice versa, making all of those plenty racing actions possible today. Three years ago there is not so many cinematics actions in the game, like landing over hills and utmost actions all around, highly skilled AI racers which rushing around the hills, but some tracks already existed, making it and helping to push to the top, improving every day it's physics, giving idea for more features, etc. Complementary latter tracks were focused on the newly done game features and concepts, highly evoking atmosphere and fun.

Also, thanks for all the in-game voices you did with cinematic immersion, without that, the game will not be the same.

Track Listing:

  • 1. 5 OFFROAD LUX
  • 2. ARIZONA DERBY
  • 3. ARIZONE IS CALLING
  • 4. DRIVING AROUND THE WORLD
  • 5. FOREST RAMPAGE
  • 6. WHEN WE RIDE
  • 7. GAME ON
  • 8. IMMA GO OFF
  • 9. ONE MORE RACE
  • 10. ONE RUSH, ONE RIDE
  • 11. TROPICAL PARADISE
  • 12. TWEAK AND TUNE

    including

    BONUS TRACK:
    GAME ON - REMIX



    The tracks can be found under root 'Arizona Derby' directory.

    Special Notice: For those who don't love hip-hop beats, we will in future update more different atmospheric and action genres to the game. You can anytime change sound settings in Options menu.
1123120.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
